snippet.title: Riddle School Legacy Re-releases
snippet.description:
Just for you. I wasn't actually planning to post these on Thanksgiving, but hey, don't look a gift turkey in the beak, or... something.

Download Links
Riddle School:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-school/143946
Riddle School 2:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-school-2/143951
Riddle School 3:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-school-3/143954
Riddle School 4:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-school-4/143957
Riddle School 5:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-school-5/143960
Riddle Transfer:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-transfer/143967
Riddle Transfer 2:  https://gamejolt.com/games/riddle-transfer-2/149520
and that's it

There will be no mobile or Steam release. I'll only use those platforms for games made in my adulthood with all-original assets. Thanks for understanding.
